title: What's your biggest branding problem right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over crowding in the marketplace. With every single person having complete and unfettered access to the Internet we have the potential for 7.8 billion individual brands. How do you sort or even find people of companies in that mess. It’s like finding a single star in the night sky.

I have zero problem. I am my brand. Nothing more and nothing less. I have a whole team of spiritual guides and the Universe itself (Lalitha Tripurasundari and Poornathrayeesa- my favorite deities) as my guides. Why should I worry? Zero worries. Only, I have to know divine timing comes into play. So, I should be patient and persistent. I am!  All the very best! Regards, Swaroopa.
